ValidationRule.description: First name & Last Name in Zimmer Sales record should not be "First Name" and "Last Name" respectively.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: and(or(FirstName = 'First Name', FirstName = '', LastName = 'Last Name', Email=''), RecordTypeId = '012800000002DoB')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: First Name, Last Name & Email can't be blank and should be in valid format.
